about_the_game:
GameMaker
Unlimited access to the IDE (integrated development environment) and learning materials.

GXC Export
Export your game to the GXC and publish your game to the fast growing Opera GX audience of more than 10 million gamers.

Desktop Exports
Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms exports.
detailed_description:
GameMaker
Unlimited access to the IDE (integrated development environment) and learning materials.

GXC Export
Export your game to the GXC and publish your game to the fast growing Opera GX audience of more than 10 million gamers.

Desktop Exports
Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms exports.
drm_notice:
YoYo Games
3 different computers (with unlimited re-activations on each one) machine activation limit
legal_notice: © 2022 YoYo Games Ltd. All rights reserved.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 Mojave
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Catalina
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

name: GameMaker Creator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated OpenGL 4-compliant onboard graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

short_description: Windows, Mac, and Linux Exports for GameMaker
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
